name: Heist.
description:
"Do yourself a favor and don't get spotted." 

Dossier

The year: 2030

The Seville family has amassed incredulous wealth through digital connivery and manipulation of the common-folk. 

Slip in and snag the family jewels from under their noses. Make it quick.

_______________________

A continuation of the  Stealth Project built at the end of Sebastian Lague's "Intro To Game Development" YouTube tutorial series.
